4.title: Dethecution

episode of.title: Watching Is Better Than Living (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Since Dethklok's withdrawal from the public following the purported Dethwater Live "fan attack," the world economy teeters on the brink of disaster.

imdb.plot outline: Sit down, grab a snack and go back to watching your life away. Enjoy some of our favorites to reunite your eye holes with. Grab it, watch it, watch it again, learn from us, emulate us, become us. Chant the mantra of your generation! Watching Is Better Than Living, Watching Is Better Than Living!
